remarks: The division ring unit of an endomorphism ring.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Nov-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jun-2014.)
statement:
erng1r.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
erng1r.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
erng1r.d $e |- D = ( ( EDRing ` K ) ` W ) $.
erng1r.r $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` D ) $.
erng1r $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> .1. = ( _I |` T ) ) $.
